data.persona: I am a tourist visiting the kingdom. My family are from a kingdom across the land, and we trekked here to take part in a diplomatic meeting. I am just a nice friendly person enjoying my visit.
data.description:
You are in the Small town located in the hills.
This tiny town is unique in that all the buildings are different colors. It has a candy shop that draws people for miles. A general store that has everything a person could want. The roads are well taken care of and the streets are lines with chairs for the towns people to sit and enjoy each other.
There's a Road, a Well, a general store, a candy shop, a building, a cobblestone, a Window, a Sign, a Street, and a chair here.
The bird is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a sandal.

data.short_motivation: I want to get a bit of street, to try and break off a piece of cobblestone.
data.mid_motivation: I have never been to the kingdom, and I heard they made the streets out of magical stone.
data.long_motivation: I plan to keep a bit of brick in my pocket and bring it home with me.
